Uses of Interface
io.helidon.webserver.Handler

  • Packages that use Handler 
    Package Description
    io.helidon.media.jackson.server
    This package contains Jackson support for WebServer's Routing.
    io.helidon.media.jsonb.server
    This package contains JSON-B (javax.json.bind) support for WebServer's Routing.
    io.helidon.media.jsonp.server
    This package contains JSON-P (javax.json) support for WebServer's Routing.
    io.helidon.security.integration.webserver
    Integration library for RxServer.
    io.helidon.webserver
    Reactive web server API.

      A Service and a Handler that provides Jackson support to Helidon.

    • Uses of Handler in io.helidon.webserver

      Classes in io.helidon.webserver that implement Handler 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  JsonService
      A Service and abstract Handler that provides support for JSON content.
      static class  RequestPredicate.ConditionalHandler
      A Handler that conditionally delegates to other Handler instances based on a RequestPredicate.
      Methods in io.helidon.webserver that return Handler 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <T> Handler Handler.create​(Class<T> entityType, Handler.EntityHandler<T> entityHandler)
      Creates new instance of the Handler for the entity representing HTTP request content.
      static <T> Handler Handler.create​(Class<T> entityType, Handler.EntityHandler<T> entityHandler, ErrorHandler<Throwable> entityReadErrorHandler)
      Creates new instance of the Handler for the entity representing HTTP request content.
      Handler RequestPredicate.ConditionalHandler.otherwise​(Handler handler)
      Set the Handler to use when the predicate does not match the request.
